How do you know that you have a Fungus infection?

If you have some or all these symptoms... you know you have fungus, Candida or a yeast infection.

1. Bloat or form gas when you eat and have stomach pains, constipation, diarrhea, mucous in the stools etc....
<br>2. Acid reflux
<br>3. Brain fog and concentration problems and poor memory
<br>4. Constant headaches, mood swings, dizziness loss of balance
<br>5. Suffer from fatigue and muscle weakness for no reason
<br>6. Sinus, post nasal drip, frequent colds, bronchitis or ear sensitivity/ringing/itching or fluid in the ears.
<br>7. Vision that gets blurry, clears, and then gets blurry
<br>8. Hypoglycemia. (shaky if meals are missed or delayed, sweaty after a meal, sweat during sleep)
<br>9. Arthritis, joint pains
<br>10. Borderline anemia
<br>11. Bad breath, coated tongue, white stuff in the throat
<br>12. Skin rashes and itching
<br>13. Chemical, dust sensitivity
<br>14. Vaginal yeast infection or jock itch
<br>15. Low libido
<br>16. Food cravings
<br>17. In between toes, Toe or finger nail fungus

Some of these fungus infection symptoms are usually worse on damp days

http://yeastinfectionnomorescam.blogspot.com/

yeastinfectionnomorescam.blogspot.comSex with a yeast infection is definitely not advised if you, or your partner, has a yeast infection. Normally this causes no problems, but, there are circumstances when the fungus overgrows out of control, causing what we know as a yeast infection The basis for this is the lowering of your body's "good bacteria" below a critical level such that there isn't sufficient good bacteria to contain and manage the Candida.

This can occur through a number of factors of which these are only a few; lowered immune system, diabetes, drugs, antibiotics, steroids (inhalers for example), bad diet, stress, illness, transfer from a sexual partner with the infection, etc.

For male yeast infection look out for a red/inflamed penis head, crazy itching, pain when urinating, smelly discharge, dry/flaking skin. In the mouth you will find white/yellowish spots on your tongue and mucous membranes, white coating, bad breath. You might also have difficulty swallowing if it is in your throat.

Your treatment is normally by topically applied medications which you buy over-the-counter, or, through prescription. They are largely drug-based and so depend on the efficacy of the drugs. However, as is well known, the Candida can and does build a resistance to them over time, and, they can have side-effects. There is also a body of opinion that believes that these normal medications treat only the symptoms, not the actual root cause. The outcome for many males and females is that the yeast infection either, is difficult and time consuming to eradicate completely, or, the yeast infection goes (or seems to go) but then comes back even worse than before. Many males and females suffer recurring yeast infection because of this.

That is why males and females around the world have felt compelled to seek an all natural approach to their cure. And many have found a fast, permanent cure with one of the most effective natural treatment regimes there is. It is a completely natural approach, which if followed to the letter, first gets rid of your symptoms giving you relief in hours, then works on the root cause to affect a permanent cure. All without the use of drugs. And because the cure is fast and permanent these people have been able to save a lot of money because they haven't needed to continually pay for more over-the-counter, and, prescription medications.

Is Yeast Infection No More just another yeast infection relief book? Is it just another scam? Does it really work?

People from around the world, men and women, of every age have have used the Yeast Infection No More program to completely cure their yeast infection condition. And yes, it eliminated their long-term recurrent yeast infections successfully. Now, they gained complete freedom from candida related symptoms naturally, without using drugs, creams, lotions, or "magic potions". The program uses the clinically proven, scientifically-accurate step by step natural and holistic method to cure the infection. This comprehensive guide offers you more than just treating your infection. It not only teaches you how to treat it, but it also gives you tips on eliminating digestive disorders, relieving migraines, resolving skin conditions, and other candida-related symptoms.

This book is a safe, simple, and natural answer to your yeast infection problem.

http://yeastinfectionnomorescam.blogspot.com/Yeast infection can be a nuisance and cause a lot of discomfort to those who get the infection. It can be very frustrating when you have tried out several treatment methods but the infection does not seem to go away. Also, many people believe that they only address the symptoms and not the root cause of your yeast infection, i.e. Candida Albicans. Certainly, many women and men have recurring yeast infections and struggle for a cure for years.

Partly because of the above, and, partly because very many people prefer natural therapies anyway; home remedies are becoming more and more popular, and certainly seem to have good outcomes if followed properly. However, on their own they are not the whole story. A solution is much broader than that, and, takes in lifestyle, as well as diet and treatment.

A completely natural approach should first of all; relieve the pain and discomfort of the symptoms; then eradicate the underlying cause; and then provide you with a "blueprint" of how to carry on, so that the Candida does not have the environment in your body to thrive ever again.

Is Yeast Infection No More just another yeast infection relief book? Is it just another scam? Does it really work?

People from around the world, men and women, of every age have have used the Yeast Infection No More program to completely cure their yeast infection condition. And yes, it eliminated their long-term recurrent yeast infections successfully. Now, they gained complete freedom from candida related symptoms naturally, without using drugs, creams, lotions, or "magic potions". The program uses the clinically proven, scientifically-accurate step by step natural and holistic method to cure the infection. This comprehensive guide offers you more than just treating your infection. It not only teaches you how to treat it, but it also gives you tips on eliminating digestive disorders, relieving migraines, resolving skin conditions, and other candida-related symptoms.

This book is a safe, simple, and natural answer to your yeast infection problem. There are so many conventional treatments for this infection that are available, such as antibiotics, lotions, creams, and other medications. But they just fail all the time. It makes your infection worse that it originally was. It makes you think that the infection is gone, until it comes back again. Not only will you have to pay more and more because of the expensive medications and because you have to every now and then because the infection is always coming back, you will also experience their side effects. There are no drugs to take or creams to apply in the Yeast Infection No More program, just a solid 5 step system to get rid of your infection permanently. The methods provided in this book use only the common household ingredients making it very accessible. The treatment program is very cheap, so you will save a lot of money from buying those expensive medications. The program is 100% natural so you won't have to experience side effects. Basically, the program's approach to the treatment is based on the fact that if you allow the body to conduct its internal cleansing process or removing toxins along with restoring the natural balances with right nutrition, it results in the body healing itself.

The book provides you with a step-by-step detailed instruction on how to eliminate the infection.

yeastinfectionnomorescam.blogspot.comCandida infection symptoms are very unpleasant and uncomfortable. I won't go into detail about why this is, but you should be aware that drugs only address the symptoms not the root causes of your infections.

These underlying issues can be things like; having diabetes, overusing antibiotics, a lowered immune system, contraception, poor nutrition, a drug habit, steroids, stress, obesity, pregnancy, etc. So that the drugs you take for your infection aren't addressing anything like these.

Now, this gets us back to why you keep getting a yeast infection after intercourse...

Although intercourse or sex in any form cannot actually cause a yeast infection, it can definitely 'transfer' the infection back and forth between sexual partners. So let's say you have an infection and have sex with somebody who doesn't, you can pass the infection onto them, which will take some time to show up.

Now let's say you take your drug-based meds and the 'symptoms' clear-up. As far as you're concerned your free of infection. But it's still in your system. And the next time you have sex with the partner, it will be transferred back to you, compounding the infection you already have. This is a vicious cycle that you need to break-out off.

And the first step is to stop all sexual contact. I know it's tough, but we're talking about you and your partner(s)' health here. This is the first important step. The next is to discover which natural home remedies will work best for you in terms of actually curing your yeast infection. Now, there are many out there, too many to go over here, except to say they use things like herbs, diet, probiotics, homeopathy, supplements, and so on.

But you don't have to spend weeks searching for these, you can get all the information you need in one downloadable report (see below) that thousands of women and men have successfully used to cure their yeast infections naturally, without expensive drugs with their horrible side effects. And they've stopped getting yeast infections after intercourse!

Yeast infection can be a nuisance and cause a lot of discomfort to those who get the infection. It can be very frustrating when you have tried out several treatment methods but the infection does not seem to go away. It is caused by Candida ablicans, harmless fungi which is naturally found in our bodies. The nature of these micro organisms is to grow and increase their numbers, however if they multiply out of control they become harmful. Their population is therefore regulated by other harmless bacteria found in the body that feeds on yeast so as to keep it in control. Hormonal body changes such as pregnancy, menses and other health issues such as weak immune system or diabetes are among the triggers for the overgrowth of yeast bacteria.

Natural yeast treatment methods have proven to be very effective in getting rid of yeast infection. They not only cure the infection but also have no side effects to your general health. One of the natural and home made treatments recommended is application of sugarless yoghurt to the infected area. Yoghurt contains bacteria that are very useful in fighting the yeast bacteria. Yeast thrive in conditions of high pH therefore yoghurt which is acidic lowers the pH discouraging yeast to grow. The bacteria feed on sugar hence the reason for sugarless yoghurt so as not to encourage yeast to grow.

They are very good for providing relief for the itching and discomfort that comes with yeast infection. Boric acid is a useful product for severe yeast infection treatment. This may happen after experiencing recurring yeast infection over and over without any successful form of treatment. As an acid it lowers the pH of the infected area whether on the vagina or penis, so as to discourage yeast growth and survival.

It is available as capsules that are put boric acid in powder form. The capsule is put inside the vagina in the evening as you go to bed and in the morning. It can also be applied directly in the vagina to get relief from soreness and urge to itch. The infection should clear within a week and the treatment stopped because long term use can cause severe irritation in the vagina. If does not clear you should consult with a doctor. Expectant women should not use boric acid for treatment yeast infection. Boric acid can be used with other forms of natural treatment such as yoghurt and aloe Vera for efficient treatment. Boric acid should be kept away from an open wound or cut.

In my personal quest for gathering as much information as I can about my own health I've read tons of books and the funny thing is that most of the time the ones on the best seller lists aren't nearly as good as the E-books you can find on the subject online. The following book I'm reviewing here is just one of those.

The book entitled Yeast Infection No More is a nice E-book for both beginners and experienced individuals dealing with Candida Yeast Infections. The book covers quite a bit in it's full 200 pages of information. It's possibly the largest E-book I've ever read. I have quite a lot of experience with Candida myself and this book was still enlightening in a lot of ways. There were times though when I read through the book and was a little overwhelmed at the amount of information that the author Linda Allen was able to accumulate, a self proclaimed Candida recovery. She covers the basics explaining what Candida is, the diet restrictions and supplement regime. The book also explains a 12 hour protocol used to bring relief within that time frame.

Knowing how hard it can be to find the RIGHT information on Candida cleansing it's nice to see that she has compiled everything from liver flushes to parasite cleanses in here as well, all in full detail as to how to complete them. Going from the most trivial to deep rooted infections, her methods of cleansing apply to all. Leaving nothing out she discusses the lifestyle changes an individual needs to make as well to accommodate a cleanse as well as preventing Candida from returning. There's so much information for someone to know who wants to do a cleanse like this that the information needs to flow easily and I feel she's done a pretty good job there as well. Overall I feel beginners to Candida cleansing may be quite surprised how much there is to it, but on the flip side she made sure to cover everything and left virtually nothing out.

Outside of this book, I would recommend people battling candida yeast infections to research Dr. Hulda Clark and Bob Beck protocols. These two developed technology that can destroy parasites and fungal infections within the body using electrical frequencies.

There's more to candida cleansing than some probiotics and anti-fungals, a good guide that comprises everything you need to know is a good start. On top of that she even offers her services as a nutritionist online. The program is 100% natural so you won't have to experience side effects. And because the cure is fast and permanent these people have been able to save a lot of money because they haven't needed to continually pay for more over-the-counter, and, prescription medications.

then, what does a yeast infection look like? Well it can look like many things, depending on where you have the yeast infection...

In the mouth you will notice a thick white coating on the tongue, white / yellow raised spots on the tongue & mucous membranes, difficulty swallowing, some throat pain and bad breath.

For the vagina, it's what the yeast infection 'feels like' rather than what it looks like. You have pain during intercourse, inability to have intercourse, inflammation / itching of vagina, vaginal odor, white vaginal discharge, pain when urinating, menstrual pain.

The penis will show pain during intercourse, inability to have intercourse / impotence, head of penis is inflamed & can itch like crazy, red spots / blisters on the head, unusual discharge, pain when urinating, dry / cracked skin.

There are other, quite surprising, signs of a yeast infection such as chronic rash, acne, irritability, mood swings, memory loss, depression, fatigue, aching or swelling joints, etc.

So, that's what a yeast infection looks like, what can you do about it?...

Your normal remedy is to use prescription drugs or over-the-counter drugs. But many people are finding that there can be side-effects with these, and, that although the signs of yeast infection may go away, they regularly come back. It is thought that this is due to the fact that the Candida becomes resistant to the drugs and the drugs may only be treating the symptoms not the root cause; Candida Albicans. And the result of nasty recurring yeast infections is that they can destroy your sense of well-being and even relationships.

Because of this very many folks around the world (it's a huge problem worldwide, you're not alone) have found a fast, permanent cure using a 100% natural treatment regime, the details of which they found on the Internet. And because it's 100% natural there are no drugs, no bad side-effects and no recurring yeast infections. It sits there quite happily without any ill-effects, most of the time, its numbers controlled by other, similar, microorganisms which together make up the 'gut flora'.

It is most frequently found that yeast infections are the second most common instigators of vaginal discharge, discomfort, itching and burning. Yeasts are found in the vagina of between 20% and 50% of healthy women, but a change of conditions in the vagina can cause the yeasts to multiply.

The use of antibiotics and steroids is the most frequent reason for yeast overgrowth, but pregnancy, menstruation, sperm, diabetes, and birth control pills can also play a part in initiating a Candida infection, which become more common following the menopause.

When we fall ill, we turn to our doctors for advice. If this results in a prescription for antibiotics or steroids we can be in danger of a Candida infection. The use of these medications can devastate the delicate balance of gut flora by killing off a huge proportion of the friendly bacteria which live in our gut. This leaves the way clear for Candida albicans to multiply out of control, leading to a yeast infection.

Think for a moment, how many times have you experienced diarrhoea following a course of antibiotics? This is a direct result of the antibiotics killing off the friendly bacteria.

Yeast infection can be a nuisance and cause a lot of discomfort to those who get the infection. It can be very frustrating when you have tried out several treatment methods but the infection does not seem to go away. It is caused by Candida ablicans, harmless fungi which is naturally found in our bodies. The nature of these micro organisms is to grow and increase their numbers, however if they multiply out of control they become harmful.
